column2: judy, 65-74 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: I was put on this to control my heart skips. I ended up on 100mg a day and it about killed me. The doctors just added more till I finally got clear headed enough to realize it was this making me sick. Have weaned myself down to 25mg a day and still I feel lousy. It makes me dizzy and have almost passed out, and I am going to get off this stuff.

column2: xena2456, 35-44 Female  on Treatment for 6 months to less than 1 year (Patient)
column9: I was told to take this after my heart started messing up. It started adding beats and going too fast making me dizzy and on the edge of fainting.  I've been on it and it my heart isn't as bad, but now I'm pregnant and scared it well hurt my baby, but the Fetal doctor said it's just going to slow the growth and well not hurt it.  I take 25mg of Metoprol TAR.  I pray that my baby is going to be fine...anyone in the same thing?
